EmailTemplate.subject: [API Welcome Pack - direct integration customer]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your recent enquiry in to Australia Post business services.
To help you integrate with our Shipping and Tracking APIs please access the supporting information in our Developer Centre.
In our Developer Centre you can access:
1) Technical Specifications for Shipping and Tracking Services
and
2) Sample code for API calls
We have also attached to this email, the supplementary guide Integrating with the Australia Post Shipping and Tracking APIs.
When you’re ready to conduct testing please use your unique account number and API credentials (provided in the attached document) in our testbed via the following URL(s).
https://digitalapi.auspost.com.au/testbed/shipping/v1/ (plus the name of your chosen API)
e.g. https://digitalapi.auspost.com.au/testbed/shipping/v1/shipments
Once you have successfully completed your testing, to enable us to validate your testbed integration can you please provide:
· A pdf label that you have generated via the testbed API
· A pdf Order Summary Report that you have generated via the testbed API.
Once we have received these files, we can validate your integration and provide you access to the production Shipping and Tracking API.
If you have any queries regarding this information, please don’t hesitate to contact us atcustomer_connectivity@auspost.com.au
Regards
Lodgement & APIs Team
Parcels, eCommerce and Digital
